about_the_game:
Wood Carving Doll Pack

This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors.
A Wood Carving Doll crafted by an artisan.
Turn into a Wood Carving Doll and survive.

Wood Carving Doll's Pack includes the following items:

Wood Carving Doll's Face
Wood Carving Doll's Body
Wood Carving Doll's Hand
Wood Carving Doll's Foot
Wood Carving Doll's Clockwork
Wood Carving Doll's Cloak
Wood Carving Doll's Wood Knife

How to apply a Skin to Equipment

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.
